mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chief Justice Warren J. Burger
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kayser, Katherine
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: Former Chief Justice Warren J. Burger, among 100 scholars, jurists and legislators gathered for the meeting, said that it is miraclous that the founding fathers garnered public support for the Constitution given the general distrust of central government and the economic and political turmoil threatening the country.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
